name: Visit of the Duke and Duchess of York to the City of London
obverse: Busts of the Duchess and Duke of York facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: T. R. H. THE DUKE AND DUCHESS OF YORK.
reverse: The Duke and Duchess in antique clothing ride in a biga (two horse chariot) driven by Cupid. The Duchess is presented a cornucopia by Londinia.
description: This medal is part of the City of London series. There were 400 specimens struck.
